insult.text: A few rounds of dice poker, guv?
Ash Ketchum is a complete loser who did nothing significant
Aim for the horn
Anyone got any adventurer spray? The things are all over the place these days
Absolute Mover IQ skill? Not in this game, pal
All right, who left the door open this time?
All right, all stored away! You can count on me, honey
All your eyebrows are belong to us
...And three! SMILES GO FOR MILES! HOORAY!
Beep boop, I am a robot from the future sent back in time to kill you, beep boop
Bitter medicine tastes like yuck
Burning the midnight oil again?
...Chocolate? Did you say...chocolate?
Come here and let me give you a hug
Come on!
Daddy! We've discovered a rare eyebrow pokemon!
Damn, you stink!
Defeating me? Impossible. That much is absolute
Did my spirit shine?
Didn't I see you at the union meeting?
Dredmor isn't about why, he's about why not
Eat your greens, son. They're good for you.
Encyclopedias? Satisfaction guaranteed or your money back!
Ever hear of doing it witcher-striga style?
E-exploration team! Run!
Exploration? Leave it to me!
Excellent...I've levelled up.
Everyone! I just finished making dinner!
Everyone will feel the pain of my lutefisk takeaway lunch
Eyebrow-er! Get it off me!
Eyebrahkiin? NO!
Friendly friends!
Fool! If you change the future, we'll all disappear!
Get out the weapons, let's try the diplomatic approach
Grabbin' pills
Good morning! Let's make it a great day!
Gosh, exploring is hard! Yup yup!
Has anyone seen my moisturiser?
Have you considered the many benefits of owning a complete set of gold-bound encyclopedias?
Have you caught many types of pokemon yet?
Have you accepted Arceus as your lord and personal saviour?
Henshin-a-go-go, baby!
Hey, hey!
Hey, I've got some great sandwiches! Want any?
Hello, there! Welcome to Dredmor assembly!
Hi-yah! I'm a witcher!
Hmm...I knew you were that kind of exploration team
Holding B doesn't improve your catch rate
How fortuitous. I must usually leave my lair to feed.
I hate you. Go away.
I didn't do it! You can't prove anything!
I CAN'T TAKE THIS ANY MORE! WHERE'S MY MEDICATION?
I will defeat you...WITH NINJA SCIENCE!
I'm done for...
I used to be an relative of a rich guy like you. Then I took a boot to the head.
I WILL STOP YOU UNTIL YOU DON'T SUCCEED!
I rob from the rich and give to the poor
I like turtles
I don't want to faint in a place like this...
I oughta listened to them when they said I was doing a dead-end degree
I'm too old for this
In you go! Into the cooking - I mean, swap cauldron!
It's a witcher, boys! Hide your women!
I have a recruitment rate of minus twenty four point five percent
I might be unable to go on...
It's got a Doom Seed! Run!
I challenge you to a pokemon battle
I like pants, they're comfy and easy to wear
IT'S SWELLING AGAIN! MY LEVEL IS SWELLING!
I bought gummis to share, do you want any
I want to be a pokemon master
I can't go exploring, I'm retired
I know everything about the world of pokemon in your game boy
If we don't bring back any perfect apples, the guildmaster will...will...
I don't see what's so great about Team Charm
I hope you find a sealed chamber and have no keys
It's nice to go exploring
It's a monster house!
It concerns me not what enemies await us
I've got a good feeling about this drink
I will overwhelm your senses and delight your digestive system
I'm going to waste all your reviver seeds
If you can wake me up, I'll grant you a wish
If you keep being difficult, it will mean big trouble for you!
If we bring this one back it'll definitely cause a stir at the guild
I'll back you up with my Helping Hand move
I'll feed your soul to Dredmor himself
I'LL BUY YOUR ENCYCLOPEDIAS! JUST STOP BEATING ME!
I'll show you how I can be useful
I must know what Master Dialga intends
I've thought about changing the world, but it's hard to be brave
I'm sorry for all the terrible things I said about you
I'm not a monster, I'm a hero management technician.
I'm happy to be exploring with you
I'm ready for work now, getting bored over here already
I'm going to go exploring all over again today!
JOOR ZAH FRUL! It isn't working! WHY ISN'T IT WORKING?
Let me guess. Someone stole your sweet-I mean, lutefisk.
Let's team up and find the golden chamber!
Let's keep this strictly professional
Let's help each other do well
Let's take on this challenge nice and steady
Let's take a look at your pokedex, shall we?
Let's work hard to be chosen for the expedition
Look at that woman's breasts. They are large.
Look at that one, its eyes are wide open but it's fast asleep
Looks like we can't quite reach an agreement
Make sure master loot's on before we down this boss
My dad never went to my spelling bees when I was a kid, and now I'm very bitter
My Rattata's like, in the top one percent
My kid is missing, will you find him?
My precious merchandise! Catch that thief!
MY FULL SUPPORT IS BEHIND YOU! HAVE CONFIDENCE!
No, we have no jobs for a witcher. Have you tried the next dungeon over?
NO ENEMY IS MY EQUAL
NOOO! WILSOOOON!
No, I'm not going to join your team even if you beat me to a bloody pulp
Now your time is over. You will love me, and nothing else.
Our guildmaster is something special, isn't he?
Oops! I dropped the lift key!
Oh my gosh! I'm so embarrassed!
Oh no, my belly's empty
Oh no...I guess I'll just put up a note on the job bulletin board
One more for the adventure log
Pills here!
Please don't spam room-wide moves, I hate that
Please share a drink and allow the flower of conversation to bloom
Protect the Time Gear
Part of a winning strategy is knowing when to withdraw
Prepare for trouble, make it double
Run! It's the Eyebrow of Blaviken!
Run! It's the greatest Eyebrow of all!
Seekers of the seven treasures! I am-oh, this isn't working.
So be it! You will all bear witness to my power!
Team Rocket, blast off at the speed of light!
Thank goodness it's Friday.
Thank you for joining us. Perhaps we can swap hero-disposal tips.
That is a fine pair of eyebrows. May I ask how much you paid for them?
The darkness swells within me
The prey approaches
The only way to truly get rid of one of these is have another eat its soul
The Good...they don't know how close to Evil they really are.
The flavours metal adds to human meat don't clash, instead they blend together in fine harmony in this dish
The unique bitterness of this situation brings out a mature flavour to the play of your life
They're adventurers, Francis.
This is my home. Please, stay awhile and make pie.
This isn't Zero Isle, you know
This is...all a nightmare!
There is no pikablu level
The Grand Master of All Things Bad doesn't exist, and we definitely aren't his minions!
That's right, I'm a wanted criminal. Do you have what it takes to bring me down?
TOO SOON, EXECUTUS! TOO SOON!
UP AND AT 'EM! IT'S MORNING!
Visiting your old friends at the guild, eh?
Wait, don't do it THAT way! That's thoroughly unsanitary!
Where next? I'll follow you wherever you go!
Want to pull sentry duty and earn some money?
Would you like a Gracidea?
Wanted outlaw spotted!
Where's our needlessly complicated mechnical contraption?
We are looking for the milkman. We don't know where he is.
We all disappear someday, what matters is what we do with our lives
Welcome to the cafe of hopes and dreams
Well, here's your big-win prize
What a farce...
When are you leaving?
Whoever loses has to wear the yellow scarf, okay?
Why two swords? Does he tend to lose them often?
Why aren't we allowed to evolve?
Why, don't you like fusion cuisine?
Why am I a cat fetus sperm tail?
Will you form an exploration team with me?
Will you take me exploring with you?
Where are we going? Gotta make up your mind!
YES! YES!
Your skin-tight costume and plaited eyebrows make me trust you
Your unique bitterness comes together for a mature flavour
You were right, this eyebrow outlaw is probably just an 'E' rank
You've fallen into my trap!
You didn't imagine I would be impeded by this, did you?
YOU EXPECT ME TO WAIT?
You broke my bicycle!
You may dream to be a god...but I will never worship you.
You wouldn't hit someone wearing glasses, would you?
You'd better not be trying to steal my husband, tramp.
Your logical mind cannot contend with an illogical opponent
Your mother uses forks the wrong way
You're still light-years away from facing Broc- I mean, Dredmor
You're keeping me from my dinner, this is an outrage

random.text: All eyebrows are mortal. You are an eyebrow. Therefore, you are mortal. Q.E.D.
Are you SURE you're really in a dungeon and not merely having a very realistic dream that you're in a dungeon?
Dang, you forgot to prepare your witcher's potions. Maybe you can harvest some stuff from the monsters around here...
Guess they weren't lying when they said there were jobs for witchers here.
Maybe taking this job off the board wasn't the best of ideas.
Maybe you should've brought a bigger Treasure Bag...
Ninjas are just a fairy tale. They don't exist, and there's definitely not one behind you right now.
Really, you'd have gotten away with it if not for those danged kids.
Remember, adventurers. Eat your greens, drink your milk, brush your teeth and stay in Dungeoneering 101 class at 300000 Zorkmids a semester.
They're probably having dinner back at the guild now.
This feels like the Battle Subway all over again.
Wait till the guys back at the guild hear about this!
What an amazing pokemon adventure this is turning out to be!
What sort of pokemon gym is this, and who in tarnation is the gym leader?
Welcome to B-Mart, shopper. Please do not park in the cephalopod parking space if you are not one.
You're certainly not getting paid enough for this.
You wonder how your partner is doing without you.
You feel the tremors of Temporal Tower disintegrating.
You feel ready to evolve any moment now. Good thing there's no one around to see it happen to you.
You nearly avoid stepping on a Shroomish.
You find yourself turning into a pokemon. Best get used to saying your name over and over again.
You know, you might be trapped in a very realistic nightmare from which you can never awaken. Isn't that a nice thought?
Your skill in destruction has increased to 25. Oops, wrong game.
Your witcher's medallion is vibrating like mad. Well, it's only to be expected.

ichor.text: smashed mechanisms (for it was secretly a robot)

title.text: Ace Trainer who is training a
Dancer who pushes a beat to
Rich Boy who wastes money on
Socialite who tries to chat up
